website_summaries.verdict: This feature-packed golf cart is well-made and has more useful capabilities than complaints.
pros: Has rubber tires that grip the ground
Lightweight and adjustable, plus it's a breeze to fold
Includes drink, scorecard, and umbrella holders and has room for other small gear
cons: Some of its components such as the brake and handle have longevity concerns
Doesn't navigate hilly courses very well

customer_reviews.title: My golf cart broke after 4th time out!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has the same cart from last year. She bought me one for my birthday. The strap that holds the clubs to the cart snapped off. I can't seem to make contact with seller to inquire about replacement part....help????
customer_reviews.author: Barry Roos

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy and Small
customer_reviews.text: Marvelous cart. Super easy to fold and adjust. And it is small enough to fit in the tiny front trunk of my Porsche Boxster S!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cart!
customer_reviews.text: Great cart! Steers straight and comfortable to push. Very compact when it folds up. The drink holder will pivot forward and backward. Had a large fountain drink in there and did not spill.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan J. Vanacker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my golfer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son, who loved it so much.would definitely buy again.and this product is made very well.im sure my son will get alot if use out of this.
customer_reviews.author: Angela A.

customer_reviews.title: Small and light weight perfect for JH golf trips
customer_reviews.text: My daughter plays golf in JH and has been asking for a cart for a while now, I finally found one with everything she was requesting. She loves not only that it is light weight but that it folds up so small.
customer_reviews.author: Vandi J. Treider

customer_reviews.title: Great golf walking cart !
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to put together Folds up nicely. Very well made. Super product - exactly what the description said it was. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed; nice assembly
customer_reviews.text: Cart is well made but also light enough to carry when folded up easily. Unfolds and folds nicely.
customer_reviews.author: PP

customer_reviews.title: Please look at the photo and reply if you know what this loose part found in the box is ... thanks
customer_reviews.text: (QUESTION - This attached photo is of a loose part amongst the packaging while unboxing. Does anyone know what this is for?) The directions were somewhat vague, but after 10 mins of assessing & coming to conclusions it went together in a few minutes. I haven’t used it yet ... but the cart seems well made. I’ll write a another review once I’ve used it ... mainly wrote the review prematurely just to see if anyone knows what the attached photo of the part is for. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Justa Plainjane

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: The ratchet that is supposed to keep the handle in place slips every time you push the cart. Mine is going in the garbage. I'd rather carry a bag than deal with this. This was the first time I'd used it, and it was the most unpleasant round of golf I've ever played.
customer_reviews.author: JB in FL

customer_reviews.title: Not a great cart
customer_reviews.text: While it's lightweight and folds up easily it is difficult to push on any kind of incline. I had a Sun Mountain Speed Cart before this and replaced it with this one because I needed a cart that took up less space in my trunk and regret my purchase. I used the cart 2X and sold it on Ebay (it was too late to return)
customer_reviews.author: MichaelG

customer_reviews.title: Part broke after 2 round .
customer_reviews.text: Looking good only if the parts were made strong enough. The cup holder broker after 2 round, but unfortunately it broke right after the 30 days return window, but it was used only twice since delivery. Would like to have some one contact us for solution. But AMZ does not make it easy to contact buyer. Very disappointed for the quality paying for that price.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Golf now
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping. Cool colors, easy to fold and open. Started using this due to the COVID scamdemic and some of the courses restricting carts. Folds into very compact size to place in trunk or back seat.
customer_reviews.author: Bigwilly

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it on a course yet but it appears to be well built and sturdy. Assembly was easy and it folds into a compact form. It's a little pricey but if it performs well and is durable it will be worth it. I'll update my review and ratings, if necessary, after I put it to real world use.
customer_reviews.author: Long Time Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light-weight cart that folds up super tiny!
customer_reviews.text: To begin, the vendor we purchased this cart from was AMAZING! Great communication and quickly resolved a minor issue we had with shipping. The cart is absolutely fantastic with lots of great features. I'm shocked at how small it folds up. It barely takes up any room in our garage or trunk. My husband loves the functionality of the cart and the color because it matches his golf bag. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Pink&Pearls

customer_reviews.title: Love/Don't Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this cart because it's foldable and fits in my trunk along with my clubs. I don't love folding and unfolding it. It has "bitten" me more than once! Plus, selecting it for its foldability sight unseen, I also would have liked something like a mesh bag to hold my personal items while I golf. STILL, I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn P.

customer_reviews.title: Research item
customer_reviews.text: It was too expensive., I put it next to my friend’s cart which she paid a lot less for. The cart I ordered thru Amazon certainly a price gouger.
customer_reviews.author: THEODORE DELLAPORTA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, replacement parts ???
customer_reviews.text: The cart is excellent. One item to consider when buying, there are nylon stretch parts on the cart. These parts will be the first things to break with use. These parts will render the cart useless. To date and 4 hours of searching I Ha e not been able to locate replacement parts on the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid push cart
customer_reviews.text: Cart is comparable to the clic 3.5, but much lighter and faster to fold and unfold. More than likely will have to realign the front wheel so may have a to add a Philips head screwdriver to your bag to be able to correct it on the fly but it’s really not too bad. Had a snag with expedited shipping but all was made well in the end. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Considine

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but just one flaw
customer_reviews.text: Love this cart, BUT I have to say the locking mechanism for the hand piece isn’t solid. It clicks/releases constantly so I can’t push down to raise the front wheel (to turn directions, hop curbs, etc). Perhaps it just needs tightening, but it’s incredibly frustrating. Otherwise it’s a great cart. Hoping to find a solution
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Not great but ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s Ok. Not great but ok. It’s overpriced. I’d rather have a 4 wheel. Also not so intuitive to fold.
customer_reviews.author: west

customer_reviews.title: Folds up
customer_reviews.text: Works great and fits in the cab of my truck
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Push cart
customer_reviews.text: Rolls easy. Just wish the front wheel could swivel. Would make it that much easier to manipulate to side to side. You have to lift on back wheels & turn. That didn’t have that type when I was purchasing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice cart for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality push cart. Price seemed reasonable, good features and shipped promptly.
customer_reviews.author: KirbySkipper

customer_reviews.title: Pulls right.....
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cart, except it was assembled so it pulls right and adjusting the screws on the wheel don’t help fix this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Adam Rome

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Love it! No issues assembling it (minimal assembly) and it fits perfectly in my trunk. Operates smoothly on the course. Shipping was quick!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Z

customer_reviews.title: Compact size.
customer_reviews.text: It replaced my 2 wheel cart. Works very well. I like how small it is, fits nicely in my small suv. Would recommend this golf cart. Co
customer_reviews.author: bud

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Cart is perfect for my sons jr. Set and fits my full size as well. All around great product.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: 3 wheel golf cart
customer_reviews.text: The unit was small and compact, yet when open was able to adequately support my larger size bag. while the cost was a little higher than other on-line stores, it was available to receive within 10 - 15 days. This appears to be a good product.
customer_reviews.author: lloyd denny

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 3rd hole
customer_reviews.text: I used it once. Brake broke and got stuck on 3rd hole. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: SDT1000

customer_reviews.title: Folds up small
customer_reviews.text: Folds up in a nice small cube. Everything else just ordinary. Overpriced compared to other lightweight carts.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Steward

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Assembly took 5 minutes. It rolls smoothly. Umbrella holder could more stable.
customer_reviews.author: PM5716

customer_reviews.title: great light weight push cart
customer_reviews.text: Used my new Cube 3 last Saturday. It was great. Light weight. Easy to open and close. Held my bag tight as a glove. Sharp looking. Highly recommend. Ponte Vedra Beach
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I like the light weight, but find the overall stability to be flimsy. It doesn’t push easily through the rough, and doesn’t feel very secure.
customer_reviews.author: sunny alsup

customer_reviews.title: Great product great service.
customer_reviews.text: Product is exceptional and the delivery was outstanding. Best golf cart I have ever purchased, easy to open and close. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Hazard

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my grandkids who like to play golf.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Gural

customer_reviews.title: Great cart!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to push , folds down easily ! Great little Cart!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great cart
customer_reviews.text: The cart is great, I just wish it was easier to manouver/turn.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Dias

customer_reviews.title: Cube golf pushcart is lighweight and compact.
customer_reviews.text: The reason I gave a 4 star overall while giving the 3 features ratings all 5 is I am concerned with durability of a mostly plastic device. Hope it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: paul h werner

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he loves it. Folds and unfolds very easily. Sturdy on the course and maneuvers easily.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Some assembly required
customer_reviews.text: The cart is great. Instruction on how to assemble and unfold were non-existent. I almost sent it back, but am glad I didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Blumberg

customer_reviews.title: Great Cart!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cart! We love them. Glides easily ... holds all “stuff” neatly. Everything we hoped for!
customer_reviews.author: Tom McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I*t was a big hit! My BF loved it. Collapses down and fits great in his trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need for your game is right there. Balls, tees, score card, water bottle.
customer_reviews.text: I like how compact it is when folded up. Fits behind the seat of my truck. The umbrella holder is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Dew

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, folds to compact size
customer_reviews.text: Needed a push cart for golf. Chose this for its light weight and ease of folding & unfolding.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Piccarreto

customer_reviews.title: Very compact and easy!
customer_reviews.text: Very compact! So easy to fold up and open! Great design. Only disappointment is tired are plastic, didnt expect that. It’s a great cart anyway!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to fold
customer_reviews.text: Great product easy to open and close and light enough to handle
customer_reviews.author: Michelle rosenblum

customer_reviews.title: Check alignment before first use
customer_reviews.text: Pulled to right, right out of the box. had to fiddle with front wheel adjustment for a few minutes. Seems to be ok now.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pull Cart
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice cart. It’s a little tricky folding and unfolding but it is very sturdy. I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This cart works just as I hoped it would
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this pull/push cart. It’s exactly what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived a day earlier and it was as expected. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Paul E

customer_reviews.title: Light and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Small footprint and light, so easy to get in and out of the back of the trunk. Still sturdy and easy to push.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Easy fold
customer_reviews.text: Cart is as small folded as expected and very Easy to open and fold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Golf Push Cart for Miata
customer_reviews.text: This product fit perfectly in the trunk of my 2018 Mazda Miata, which is very small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This cart breaks down very small.
customer_reviews.text: This push cart is the best I have ever owned,easy to assemble easy to break down. Well worth the $$ no doubt it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: 18 holes 3 wheels  Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Well made , very compact when folded. Large wheels offer a soft ride for the clubs
customer_reviews.author: David M.

product_meta.title: Cube CART 3 Wheel Push Pull Golf CART - Two Step Open/Close - Smallest Folding Lightweight Golf CART in The World - Choose Color!
product_meta.description: Rated the fastest two-step compact folded golf cart in the world, the CUBE's simple folding system allows it to easily reduce down in size to fit into the smallest of car trunks. Its ergonomic handle with adjustable height control features generous integrated storage space, including drink and scorecard holders, an accessory compartment; plus tee and ball holders. Other features include easy-run oversize wheels, a foot-operated parking brake, and adjustable bag supports. IDEAL FOR: Space-conscious golfers looking for an easy-to-fold push trolley bursting with features. BONUS: Free umbrella holder included!
feature_bullets: Only 14.5 lbs and compact folded size of: 21" x 13" x 17"
Simple two-step folding system - FREE umbrella holder included!
Friction-free oversize wheels with maintenance free rubber tires
Easy push ergonomic handle with 3 height adjustable positions
Easy to put together: Just insert the two rear wheels (takes only seconds)!
